personal.name: Patrick Azabe
personal.title: Software Engineer
personal.bio: A highly skilled Software Engineer and Mobile Engineer with a strong background in backend development, specializing in designing and implementing robust, scalable, and efficient server-side solutions. Proficient in Java, PHP, .NET, Node.js, Flutter, and Ionic, with expertise in building and optimizing APIs and sustainable systems. Skilled in frontend technologies such as HTML, CSS, Angular, and React, enabling effective contributions to fullstack development projects. Passionate about crafting high-performance software solutions that align with industry best practices and exceed client expectations.
